Text:
This is Bangkok Dangerous (2008) with Nicolas Cage. 
Ignore the wrong year from the torrent file's title. 

Reseeded/reuploaded the third time but please keep seeding till the 1.0 ratio. The movie is not bad, I'd say it's average.
4.38 GB is not enough to store 1h 38mn FullHD action movie with x.264 codec. U could simply downscale it to 720p, it would be better.
Can anyone tell me if there are hardcoded subs for the non-English parts?
